thread.title: We’re almost in a mental health epidemic, says Goldie Hawn – Le VisionaryAline

author: Author Visionaryaline
title: We’re almost in a mental health epidemic, says Goldie Hawn – Le VisionaryAline
text:
Author VisionaryAline Published février 11, 2018 Comments 0 
Advertisements: 
After decades of starring in major Hollywood movies, actress Goldie Hawn has shifted her career focus to improving children’s mental health — and there is a lot of work to be done, she told CNBC at the World Government Summit in Dubai.
